channel.title: Cityandcities on 槐安遇明
channel.description: Recent content in Cityandcities on 槐安遇明

item.description: Do you remember when we were little? We were playing in the park, And you asked me what happens when we die. I said you forget everything… Everything. “Even you?” you asked. “Yes, even me.” You did not want to die. Never forget. The remains of what we used to have, Were taken away with the softest squeeze. How did I forget? How…?
